title: Web-Based Interactive Learning Course for Core Dental Medicine Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational dental theory and clinical experience
context.additional_context: A project-based learning course in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, utilizing web-based interactive content to support dental practitioners' understanding of complex theories.

learning_goals: Learners explain spatial relationships of oral structures with 90% accuracy using a web-based 3D anatomy atlas
Learners identify major lesions with over 85% accuracy through virtual panoramic radiograph interpretation
Learners perform eight or more of the ten standard treatment protocol steps in an interactive cavity preparation simulation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
